biotools.summary: SAMIRIX is a custom-developed intraretinal segmentation pipeline. It modularly includes import filters for OCT data, a 3rd-party segmentation algorithm, a user interface for controlling and correcting segmentation results, and batch-operations for processing multiple OCT images.

bioschemas.name: SAMIRIX
bioschemas.summary: SAMIRIX is a custom-developed intraretinal segmentation pipeline. It modularly includes import filters for OCT data, a 3rd-party segmentation algorithm, a user interface for controlling and correcting segmentation results, and batch-operations for processing multiple OCT images.
